" Application Name - "+{!VarSoftwareName}+"

formulas.name: Servicedetailrequest1
formulas.expression: IF({!Country1}!=NULL, {!Space}+"Country - " +{!Country1}+ {!Newline}, "")+{!Newline}+ IF({!Hiring_Manager.recordName}!=NULL, "Hiring manager - " +{!Hiring_Manager.recordName}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Model_After_User.recordName}!=NULL, "Model After User - " +{!Model_After_User.recordName}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Email_Domain_Requested}!=NULL, "Email Domain Requested - " +{!Email_Domain_Requested}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Email_Domain_Requested1}!=NULL, "Email Domain Requested - " +{!Email_Domain_Requested1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Default_Signature_Template}!=NULL, "Default Email Signature - " +{!Default_Signature_Template}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Office_License_Type}!=NULL, "Microsoft Office License Type - " +{!Office_License_Type}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Office_License_Type1}!=NULL, "Microsoft Office License Type - " +{!Office_License_Type1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Employee_Type}="Billable" && {!Office_License_Type}="Full Desktop Access" && {!Hiring_Manager.recordId}<>{!Get_Logged_In_User.Id}, {!Label} + {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Teams_Phone_Access1}!=NULL, "Team Phone Access - " +{!Teams_Phone_Access1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Call_Queue}!=NULL, "Call Queue - " +{!Call_Queue}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Additional_Information10}!=NULL,"Additional Information - " +{!Additional_Information10}+ {!Newline}, "") + {!Newline}

formulas.name: ServiceRequest
formulas.expression: IF({!Label4}!=NULL,"Hardware Information :- "+ {!Newline} , "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Bundle - " +{!Laptop_Type}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle B1: One (1) developer laptop, two (2) monitors, one (1) keyboard/mouse combo, one (1) headset, and (1) dock, (1) DisplayPort to HDMI Adapter", {!Approval4}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle B2: One (1) developer laptop, one (1) monitor, one (1) keyboard/mouse combo, and one (1) headset", {!Approval4}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle B3: One (1) developer laptop, one (1) keyboard/mouse combo, one (1) headset", {!Approval4}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle B4: One (1) developer laptop", {!Approval4}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle B5: One (1) developer laptop, one(1) dock", {!Approval4}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle D1: One (1) MacBook, two (2) monitors, one (1) keyboard/mouse combo, one (1) headset, and (1) dock", {!Approval5}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle D2: One (1) MacBook, one (1) monitor, one (1) keyboard/mouse combo, and one (1) headset", {!Approval5}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle D3: One (1) MacBook, one (1) keyboard/mouse combo, one (1) headset", {!Approval5}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle D4: One (1) MacBook", {!Approval5}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle D5: One (1) MacBook, one(1) dock", {!Approval5}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle E1: One (1) Executive laptop, two (2) monitors, one (1) keyboard/mouse combo, one (1) headset, and (1) dock, (1) DisplayPort to HDMI Adapter", {!Approval2}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle E2: One (1) Executive laptop, one (1) monitor, one (1) keyboard/mouse combo, and one (1) headset", {!Approval2}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle E3: One (1) Executive laptop, one (1) keyboard/mouse combo, one (1) headset", {!Approval2}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle E4: One (1) Executive laptop", {!Approval2}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}="Bundle E5: One (1) Executive laptop, one(1) dock", {!Approval2}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type1}!=NULL, {!Space}+"Laptop Type - " +{!Laptop_Type1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type1}="Developer", "" +{!approval1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type1}="Executive", "" +{!Approval2}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type1}="Mac", "" +{!Approval5}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type2}!=NULL, {!Space}+"Laptop Type - " +{!Laptop_Type2}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type2}="Developer", "" +{!approval1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type2}="Executive", "" +{!Approval2}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Laptop_Type1}!=NULL, "Hardware Accessories" + {!Newline}, "") + If({!Docking_Station}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Docking Station" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Docking_Station1}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Docking Station" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!External_Monitor_Single}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Monitor: Single" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!External_Monitor_Double}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Monitors: Dual" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Monitor_Single1}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Monitor: Single" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Monitor_Single2}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Monitor: Single" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Monitor_Single3}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Monitor: Single" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Headset_Wired}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Headset: Wired" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Headset_Wired1}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Headset: Wired" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Headset_Wired2}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Headset: Wired" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Speaker}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Desktop Speaker (Jabra)" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Keyboard_Mouse_Combo_Wireless}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Keyboard/Mouse Combo: Wireless" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Keyboard_Wireless}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Keyboard: Wireless" +{!Newline},null)

formulas.name: Servicerequest2
formulas.expression: If({!Mouse_Wireless}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Mouse: Wireless" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Device_Charger}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Laptop Charger" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Laptop_Charger1}=TRUE,{!Space}+"Laptop Charger" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Laptop_Charger2}=TRUE,{!Space}+"Laptop Charger" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Laptop_Charger3}=TRUE,{!Space}+"Laptop Charger" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Monitor}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Monitors: Dual" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Mouse}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Mouse" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Headset}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Headset" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Keyboard}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Keyboard" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Keyboard_Wired}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Keyboard: Wired" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Mouse_Wired}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Mouse: Wired" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!External_Webcam_Wired}==TRUE,{!Space}+"External Webcam: Wired" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Printer}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Printer" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Printer2}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Printer" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Other}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Other" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Other1}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Other" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Other2}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Other" +{!Newline},null)+ If({!Other3}==TRUE,{!Space}+"Other" +{!Newline},null)+ IF({!Laptop_Type}!="None-No Laptop needed" ,{!Label4}+ {!Newline} , "") + IF({!Laptop_Type}!="None-No Laptop needed" && {!Label4}!= Null ,"Shipping Address"+ {!Newline} , "") + IF({!Address_10}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Address 1 - " +{!Address_10}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Address_20}!=NULL, {!Space}+"Address 2 (Apt or Unit #) - " +{!Address_20}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!City}!=NULL, {!Space}+"City - " +{!City}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!State_Province}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "State/Province - " +{!State_Province}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Zip_Postal_Code}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Zip/Postal Code - " +{!Zip_Postal_Code}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Country}!=NULL, {!Space}+"Country - " +{!Country}+ {!Newline}, "")+{!Newline}+ IF({!Country_code21}!=NULL,"Country Code - " +{!Country_code21}+ {!Newline}, "") +IF({!Country_code22}!=NULL, "Country Code - " +{!Country_code22}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Country_code23}!=NULL, "Country Code - " +{!Country_code23}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Country_code24}!=NULL, "Country Code - " +{!Country_code24}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Personal_Phone_Number}!=NULL, "Personal Phone Number - " +{!Personal_Phone_Number}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Personal_Email_Address}!=NULL, "Personal Email Address - " +{!Personal_Email_Address}+ {!Newline}, "") +{!Newline}+ IF({!Additional_Information1}!=NULL, "Additional Information - " +{!Additional_Information1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Additional_Information}!=NULL, "Additional Information - " +{!Additional_Information}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Additional_Information20}!=NULL, "Additional Information - " +{!Additional_Information20}+ {!Newline}, "")

formulas.name: ServiceRequestdetails
formulas.expression: "User Information :- "+ {!Newline}+ IF({!Region}!=NULL, {!Space}+ "Region - "+{!Region}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Brand}!=NULL, {!Space}+"Brand - " +{!Brand}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Department}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Department - " +{!Department}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Department11}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Department - " +{!Department11}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Department12}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Department - " +{!Department12}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Employee_Type}!=NULL, {!Space}+"Employee Type - " +{!Employee_Type} + {!Newline}, "") + IF({!First_Name}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "First Name - " +{!First_Name}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Middle_Name}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Middle Name - " +{!Middle_Name}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Last_Name}!=NULL, {!Space}+"Last Name - " +{!Last_Name}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Preferred_Name}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Preferred Name - " +{!Preferred_Name}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF(TEXT({!Start_Date})!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Start Date - " +TEXT({!Start_Date})+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Job_Title}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Job Title - " +{!Job_Title}+ {!Newline}, "") +{!Newline}+ IF({!Country_code10}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Country Code - " +{!Country_code10}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Country_code12}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Country Code - " +{!Country_code12}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Country_code13}!=NULL, {!Space}+"Country Code - " +{!Country_code13}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Country_code14}!=NULL, {!Space}+"Country Code - " +{!Country_code14}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Personal_Phone_Number1}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Personal Phone Number - " +{!Personal_Phone_Number1}+ {!Newline}, "") + IF({!Personal_Email_Address1}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Personal Email Address - " +{!Personal_Email_Address1}+ {!Newline}, "") +{!Newline}+ "Home Address"+ {!Newline}+ IF({!Address_01}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Address 1 - " +{!Address_01}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Address_02}!=NULL, {!Space}+"Address 2 (Apt or Unit #) - " +{!Address_02}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!City1}!=NULL, {!Space}+"City - " +{!City1}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!State_Province1}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "State/Province - " +{!State_Province1}+ {!Newline}, "")+ IF({!Zip_Postal_Code1}!=NULL,{!Space}+ "Zip/Postal Code - " +{!Zip_Postal_Code1}+ {!Newline}, "")

fields.name: text
fields.fieldText: New Hire﻿ Request with Case Number# {!GetCaseId.CaseNumber} has been created.

fields.name: display11
fields.fieldText: Region - {!Region}

fields.name: display12
fields.fieldText: Brand - {!Brand}

fields.name: approval1
fields.fieldText:
Approvals Required-

This option is for software developers only and will require IT Approval.

fields.name: Approval2
fields.fieldText:
Approvals Required

This option is for VPs and above and will require IT Approval.

fields.name: Approval5
fields.fieldText:
Approvals Required

This option will require business justification or be a client requirement. IT Approval is required.

fields.name: Approval4
fields.fieldText:
Approvals Required

This option is for software developers only and will require IT Approval.

fields.fieldText:
Shipping Information
